meta.title: An Overview of the Four Bön of the Cause

nodes.body: These four are also part of the "twelve lores" (shes pa bcu gnyis). #1 is found in lores #2, 7, 8, 9, and 11; #2 is found in lores #1, 3, 5, 6, 9, and 10; #3 is found in lore #12; and #4 is found in lore #4.
nodes.title: An Overview of the Four Bön of the Cause
